Funded coins will have different wording and removal of the BF text on the sides to indicated they are indeed funded.Hologram + autograph on the back will be available for a limited time on coins purchased before October 11th, 2023 HST.BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY Â =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram. Both copies of the key are under the respective coin's hologram.Bitcoin addresses and associated serial #â€™s are also visible on the back of each coin on the outer rim area of the back. All Shipments are shipped via USPS Registered Mail with restricted delivery (meaning you have to show your ID and sign for the package).If you wish to purchase these Lealana BTC silver coins and do not wish to fund the coins, you may do so but each coinâ€™s hologram will be marked as â€œBUYER FUNDEDâ€ denoting this coin was never funded before it shipped.FUNDING YOUR COIN(S) <â€”â€” Important1. All coins intended on being funded are required to be funded BEFORE they are shipped out. Any digital value that is stored on the coins while in transit are at your sole risk and responsibility. Lealana is not responsible for any digital cryptocurrency value while in transit by mail courier.2. Your coin address list will be PGP signed and sent to you for you to fund with the EXACT face value of (0.2020 BTC).3. Should you miss this deadline your coin shipment will be delayed. DISCLOSURE OF RAINBOW COLOR VARIATION==========================================There is a possibility that the rainbow color may vary with these coins given the production process being used is different than the brass/nickel coin process.This is to notify you that this possibility may exist and that Lealana will not be held liable for any such color differences/variations from the pictures presented above. Before purchasing, please consider this and make your own decision whether to buy or not.

comments.body: 9-COIN SETS REMAINING = 2 LEFTThere are several outstanding requests for reservations that have not paid.Whoever pays first and confirms it with me will get those remaining sets.I'll send out messages to all interested parties who have not paid shortly.Once you pay shoot me an email or PM to confirm your set.

comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on September 15, 2023, 09:41:39 AMThe rainbows here are some of the best looking coins I have seen to date, just beautiful Â I am sure you won't have too much trouble selling these quickly.Mahalo nui loa CoinageMint!Quote from: mortare on September 15, 2023, 09:47:54 AMhowlee, what a killer release, love these !Mahalo nui loa mortare!Quote from: jackbauercsgo on September 15, 2023, 11:48:13 PMThese look really nice. Well done. Appreciate the kinds words Jack.Quote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on September 16, 2023, 08:16:35 AMThese look great! Good Job.Thanks Carribbean. Keep doing what you're doing as well.Quote from: montreal1 on September 16, 2023, 10:12:06 AMcan't stop looking at these photos, love the Halloween/reaper theme!!! Montreal1, I had the same problem with the staring at the pix.Halloween is one of my favorite times of year/holidays. AlohaQuote from: tldr-hodl on September 16, 2023, 12:03:35 PMPretty sure this full set will be one of the all time grails....@tldr-hodl, Grails?Perhaps I'm out of the loop on terminology.Big mahalo to all who have ordered coins.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.created_time: September 18, 2023, 11:53:45 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 12:14:41 AM by Kryptowerk
comments.body: Recent 1 oz silver rainbow Tenth coins already looked incredible in-hand. Judging from the photos here, this might top it.Can't wait to have them in hand and see for myself.Also, thinking about adding one or two singles.
